title: AI investment collapse could make US economy vulnerable: Jefferies
description: A sudden collapse in artificial intelligence (AI) investment could make the United States economy vulnerable, as AI-related capital expenditure has emerged as a key driver of economic growth in recent years, highlighted a report by Jefferies.
content: New Delhi [India], January 9 (ANI): A sudden collapse in artificial intelligence (AI) investment could make the United States economy vulnerable, as AI-related capital expenditure has emerged as a key driver of economic growth in recent years, highli... [3054 chars]

title: How to Use Gmail’s New AI Tools: Help Me Write, Smart Search, and AI Inbox
description: Google has announced one of the biggest updates in Gmail’s 22-year history, embedding artificial intelligence to make the world’s most popular email service smarter and more helpful. With over 3 billion users, Gmail is now evolving into something closer to a personal assistant.
content: Google is reshaping Gmail with artificial intelligence, marking one of the most significant changes since its launch more than two decades ago. With over three billion users worldwide, the update aims to transform email from a simple communication to... [1987 chars]

title: AI-Generated Court Submissions Drawing Increasingly More Severe Sanctions
description: Discusses the sanctions imposed in Billups v. Louisville Municipal School Distr., where an attorney cited faulty artificial intelligence (AI) output and violated Rule 11
content: The number of court orders and opinions being issued as to faulty or entirely hallucinated legal citations in submission seems to have reached a contagion level. In just a single year, we've gone from maybe one such case a month where we all circulat... [13744 chars]

title: Lenovo to build, export AI servers from India
description: Global tech giant Lenovo is set to transform India into a major export hub for its infrastructure business. The company will design and manufacture artificial intelligence servers in India for worldwide markets. This move leverages India's workforce and existing manufacturing success.
content:

title: Slower US job growth expected in December; unemployment rate likely dipped
description: U.S. job growth likely slowed in December amid business caution about hiring because of import tariffs and rising artificial intelligence investment, though an anticipated easing in the unemployment rate to 4.5% could support expectations the Federal Reserve will leave interest rates unchanged this month.

title: Marcos launches AI drive in schools to train 1.5m Pinoys
description: President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Friday launched a nationwide artificial intelligence program in public education that aims to train up to 1.5 million
content:
President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Friday launched a nationwide artificial intelligence program in public education that aims to train up to 1.5 million Filipinos while establishing the country’s first ethical framework for AI use in schools.

title: Regulating AI in the Real World: Why Capacity Building Matters More Than Rules
description: UNESCO’s report argues that artificial intelligence cannot be governed with traditional, one-time regulatory checks, and that supervisory authorities must instead build continuous, learning-based institutions capable of interpreting AI behaviour in real-world contexts. It concludes that capacity building, through tools like observatory units, monitoring systems, and regulatory sandboxes is the key to making AI oversight effective, trustworthy, and aligned with public values.
content: An UNESCO report, "Pathways on Capacity Building for AI Supervisory Authorities," was produced by UNESCO in partnership with the Dutch Authority for Digital Infrastructure (RDI), with financial support from the European Union’s Technical Support Inst... [5237 chars]
